Prerequisite:
Students must be reading the Bachelor of Science degree.
Student must have met Honours eligibility requirements for specific major and passed SP1001 Career Planning & Preparation or NCC1001 Headstart Module (A Career Development Programme) or NCC1000 Stepup Module (A Career Development Programme) or CFG1001 Headstart Module or CFG1000 StepUp Module.
ModuleDescription: For Bachelor of Science (Honours) students to participate full-time in a six-month-long project in an applied context that culminates in a project presentation and report.
